thread.title: Cruz, Santorum, Fiorina in New Hampshire for GOP forum
thread.title_full: Cruz, Santorum, Fiorina in New Hampshire for GOP forum - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Cruz, Santorum, Fiorina in New Hampshire for GOP forum
text:
HOOKSETT, N.H. (AP) - Republican White House hopefuls Ted Cruz, Rick Santorum and Carly Fiorina are appearing at a New Hampshire forum on limiting the powers of the federal government.
The American Principles Project is hosting the forum Saturday in Hooksett. Conservative advocacy group Cornerstone Action is co-hosting the event. Speakers at the event, including the presidential candidates, will discuss ways for voters to fight back against the federal government. Topics up for discussion include the Common Core education standards, U.S. monetary policy and New Hampshire politics.
Neither Cruz, a Texas senator, nor Santorum, a former Pennsylvania senator, have spent much time campaigning in New Hampshire as they seek the GOP nomination. Fiorina, a former business executive, continues to visit frequently and roll out endorsements here.
